motto: Dominus Illuminatio Mea (The Lord is my Light)

admissions.overview: Our admissions are highly competitive. Applications open from September and close in mid-October.
admissions.requirements: Applicants must meet A-Level or IB requirements. Additional entrance exams may be required for some courses.

campus_life.housing: Oxford offers on-campus accommodation for all first-year students.
campus_life.student_societies: Over 400 student societies, including debating, music, and drama clubs.

tuition_fees.undergraduate: £9,250 per year (UK students), £39,000 per year (International students)
tuition_fees.postgraduate: Varies by program; ranges from £20,000 to £50,000 per year
tuition_fees.scholarships: Oxford offers multiple scholarships, including Rhodes and Clarendon Scholarships.

contact.address: University of Oxford, Oxford OX1 2JD, United Kingdom
